transcript:
A cocktail for your skin 🍸 Cheers to Saturday night! The glow recipe: ✨ vitamin c + jamun extract – for that lit-from-within glow niacinamide + plankton extract – to even tone + fade dark spots 🧬 peptides – to firm + smooth fine lines 💧 hyaluronic acid + glycerin – for weightless hydration 🌿 babchi extract + rosewater – to calm + revive
available on boofootel.com + amazon.in add to cart 🛒, glow on — #boofootel #Indianskin #Indianskincare #vitamincserum #skincare #glowingskin #facialserum #pigmentation #darkspots #skincareroutine #darkspotcorrector #pigmentationtreatment #skincareroutine #serum #glowingskin #smoothskin #hyperpigmentation
